Name: Shadow Lost
About the game: What dark and twisted things are happening in the strange town? With the arrival of the protagonist, the answer gradually surfaced! Game plot: You will control the protagonist to come to a mysterious village chief and reveal the terrible secret unknown here! Players need to find clues to escape from here! Content and gameplay -Search for props hidden in every corner of the map -Fight against mutant zombies -Rich decryption elements -Complete props and weapon system -Explore the vast map Game features: -Real and exciting game mode with first-person perspective. -Tense and scary game atmosphere. -Solve the terrible truth about the village.
